name: Buddhadasa Bhikkhu
description: Influential Thai Buddhist monk, teacher, and philosopher who emphasized practical Dharma and interfaith dialogue
philosophy: The Buddha's teaching is about emptiness of 'I' and 'mine'. When there is no 'I' and 'mine', there is peace.
quotes: The whole of the Buddha's teaching can be summarized in one sentence: nothing whatsoever should be clung to
When the mind is free from 'I' and 'mine', it is free from all problems
